User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the store.

name.description: The full name of the user.

email.description: The email address of the user.

isEmailVerified.description: Indicates whether the user's email address has been verified.

isAdmin.description: Indicates whether the user is an admin and has access to the Admin panel.

isEmployee.description: Indicates whether the user is an employee and has access to the Hexa Vision SMM panel.

registrationDate.description: The date and time the user registered.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

walletBalance.description: The user's wallet balance in the local currency.

Username.title: Username
Username.description: Represents a unique username reservation to prevent duplicates.

uid.description: The UID of the user who owns this username.

Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a product in the store.

description.description: A short description of the product.

price.description: The current selling price of the product.

originalPrice.description: The original price of the product, before any discounts.

shippingDate.description: Estimated shipping date for the product.

definition.description: Stores user data. Allows users to read and write their own data based on their userId.
Stores unique usernames to prevent duplicates. The document ID is the username. Client-side creation is allowed via transaction but updates and deletes are disabled.
